itunes:title: #37: The Label DOES Matter
title: #37: The Label DOES Matter
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: When working to have clarity in your relationships, first thing we gotta start with is the label. In this episode, we talk about why labels DO matter and how going without them can be connected to retriggering your trauma.   The Recovery School...
itunes:summary:
When working to have clarity in your relationships, first thing we gotta start with is the label. In this episode, we talk about why labels DO matter and how going without them can be connected to retriggering your trauma.
